diesel.title: Diesel Generators
diesel.description: Diesel generators combine a diesel engine with an electric generator to deliver superior performance. The diesel engine uses diesel as fuel to produce mechanical energy, which drives the generator, converting it into electrical energy.

gasoline.title: Gasoline Generators
gasoline.description: Gasoline generators offer practical and portable solutions by using gasoline fuel to generate electrical energy. With their lightweight and ergonomic designs, they are widely used in homes and outdoor events.
